original_text: But the goat chosen by lot as the scapegoat shall be presented alive before the Lord to be used for making atonement by sending it into the wilderness as a scapegoat.
korean_text: 아사셀을 위하여 제비 뽑은 염소는 산 채로 여호와 앞에 두었다가 그것으로 속죄하고 아사셀을 위하여 광야로 보낼지니라

sentences.original_text: But the goat chosen by lot as the scapegoat
shall be presented alive before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주 앞에 살아있는 채로 바쳐질 것이며

sentences.original_text: to be used for making atonement
by sending it into the wilderness
